thread.title: Of Course Sabine Schmitz Can Name Every Corner Of The Nürburgring From Memory
thread.title_full: Of Course Sabine Schmitz Can Name Every Corner Of The Nürburgring From Memory

author: Kristen Lee
title: Of Course Sabine Schmitz Can Name Every Corner Of The Nürburgring From Memory
text:
Top Gear host, German racing driver and Queen of the Nürburgring Sabine Schmitz knows the track like the back of her hand. Know how I know? Advertisement 
She can name every single corner of the damn thing from memory. I mean... if I had driven it as many times as she has, I might be able to pull that off, too. Maybe. I don’t think I’ll ever be as cool as her, though. 
We should just go ahead and crown her Queen of the World. Top Gear Fun
